amendment.description: To correct the characterization of the funding authority for up-armored high mobility multi-purpose wheeled vehicles and wheeled vehicle ballistic add-on armor protection.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3205 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3205 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5785-5786; text: CR S5785-5786) To correct the characterization of the funding authority for up-armored high mobility multi-purpose wheeled vehicles and wheeled vehicle ballistic add-on armor protection.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3205 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3205 proposed by Senator Warner.
